Usage

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

border-700
border-blue-700
border-purple-700

<div class="card ...">
    <div class="border-700 ..." style=" ...">border-700</div>
    <div class="border-blue-700 ..." style=" ...">border-blue-700</div>
    <div class="border-purple-700 ..." style=" ...">border-purple-700</div>
</div>
